bookText.htmlContent: androids are either fully created beings or partially modified humans, in which case they would be called cyborgs, but most people refers to them as androids anyway.

androids are humanoid powered by mechanical parts that can create an infinite amount of KI, making their usage focused mainly around fighting as they excel in generating KI blasts, being as well where the KI outshines magic. the usage of KI is far less used here since it was recently discovered and shows less possibilty and flexibility than magic does.
